title: Celebrity Gossip Part 1: The Worst Anniversary Gift
description: A Marvel star believed his wife when she said “Let’s not get each other anniversary gifts.” and then she gave him an incredible gift. Plus, Ashton Kutcher went temporarily blind and deaf from an autoimmune disease.
itunes:author: YEA Networks
